channel.title: Make a item for staff?
channel.description: i know ive posted before but got no replies and i really need help... my server is PICKUP so i want it so that only staff can wear such items like i wana create mod armour and admin armour and stuff. so please can you explain how to do it coz i need to do about 30 :( ... thanks :))

item.title: Make a item for staff?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

that pickup s just sad…all that does is well…nothing. And also he did not ask for a staffzone.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2009, 02:47:01 pm[/size][hr] if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } else if (newItemID = staff item ID here)) { sM("this is for staff members only") }

NOTE: This is for a delta base source. You may have to change some variables such as sM

Read full topic

}
else if (command.startsWith(“az”) && playerRights >= 1)
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Owner dustin
} else {
teleportToX = 3281;
teleportToY = 2766;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the Mod & Admin Zone.”);
sendMessage(“GREAT JOB YOU FINALLY EARNED MOD or ADMIN!”);
}
Ok so if you wanted ur mod armor goood. Right under that post this
}
else if (command.startsWith(“pickup 747 1”) && playerRights >= 1)
if (teleblock == true) {

        }

Then if sum1 tries to do it. IT wont let them pick it up.
If it doesnt work pm me and i will help you more out.
Thugscape[/quote]
